Name /Title: Verify the Alignment of fields on the Story screen
Steps to be Executed:
1-Application opened Successfully
2-Create account and Login
3-HomePage Opened successfully
4- Click on "Add Story"
Expected Results: The fields and icons should be alligned in a good way.
Actual Result: The fields and icons should be alligned in a good way.
